title: Can't do Doom Map From Alpha Cleint
body: Today Launched the new game mode called "Doom", To play this mode I have to log into the original client, even after the patches and updates.

replies.body: Yes, sad times. I had to go back to the old one too. We don't have all the game modes enabled yet. {{item:3070}}
You can play if someone invites you even in the alpha client {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
